property_details: Address & Area : Rangs Malancha, House-68, Road-6A (Dead End Road), Dhanmondi Residential Area. Flat Size : 3000 Sq Feet. Floor :  A5 (5th Floor) (6 storied Building ) (South Facing Unit), Room Category : 3 Large Bed Rooms with 3 Verandas, Spacious Drawing, Dining & Family Living Room, Highly Decorated Kitchen with Store Room and Servant room with attached Toilet. Facilities : 1 Modern Lift, All Modern Amenities & Semi Furnished. Additional Facilities : a. Electricity with full generator load, b. Central Gas Geyser, c. 2 Car Parking with 1 Driver’s Accommodation, d. Community Conference Hall, e. Roof Top Beautified Garden and Grassy Ground, f. Cloth Hanging facility with CC camera
